name: jProductivity
tag_list: licensing, license-manager, license-management, copy-protection, product-activation, software-licensing
overview:
jProductivity is a developer of the leading multi-platform protection and licensing software solutions.

jProductivity, LLC is a New York-based software company founded by experienced system analysts and developers. Since 2004, the company has been making tools and specialized solutions for software developers and software publishers.
jProductivity’s Protection Licensing Toolkit is a proven, trusted solution to the problem of software piracy. Protection is a powerful multi-platform licensing management toolkit that ensures that your customers are using your software legally. Protection keeps pirates from stealing your software, and virtually eliminates casual pass-around piracy. By eliminating unauthorized software use, Protection increases your income.
